mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Ashby, George
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Rown Co., VA [Roane County, West Virginia]
Allens Fork Jackson Co., VA [Allens Fork Jackson County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Ashby, George Patient Age: 16. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of lower jaw. Ball striking about one half inch from the syphysis [Symphysis mensi or chin]. Wound received by a passing ball. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/24. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Treatment: Simple dressing. Result: Returned to duty.
